title: Cardinal Ranjith to call on Pope
content: Archbishop of Colombo Cardinal Malcolm Ranjith is scheduled to meet Pope Francis in a short while, at the St. Peterâ€™s Basilica at the Vatican.The Cardinal, who travelled to the Vatican on 23 February, is expected to discuss matters concerning the 2019 Easter Sunday Terror attacks. Cardinal Malcolm Ranjith has, on many occassions, accused the government of failing to fulfill its duties and serve justice to the attacks' victims.He has regarded the investigations pertaining to the matter as 'conspiracies' and 'jokes', after several high-ranking officials were protected from prosecution over charges relating to the attacks.
